title: Darius' passive bleed should be changed back to Magic Damage
body:
I didn't even consider the possibility it would be changed during his rework because it was really obvious

with a Black Cleaver Darius just needs a single AutoAttack to fully shred an opponent's armor

with a single Decimate (Q) he can fully stack the shred on multiple people, potentially the entire team

Talon has a physical bleed that can proc the shred, but it's solely on a single target ability

I'm sick of hearing about "The Juggernauts", but I feel like this is one thing that should be changed back

replies.body:
if they bring back magic damage hes going to be hard to itemize against and people complained about that

and a single Q applies 5 stacks of BC not 6

i think it should be changed back for other reasons, nothing to do with the black cleaver proc. i think it should go back to magic dmg cuz it gives him a way of doing something other than pure physical dmg all the time. it made it harder to itemize against darius when his bleed was doing magic dmg. i  dunno, it helped give him the ability to be a lane bully like he used to be. he's still strong early, but not like before. you wanna buy a chain vest  in lane aginst him? go ahead, he'll just keep stacking his passive bleed and make it useless. i liked that
